SEARCH
Package com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.dao

Class TrendDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.dao.TrendDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TrendDao
@Repository public class TrendDaoImpl extends Object implements TrendDao
Concrete implementation of the TrendDao interface. Provides CRUD operations for the Trend entity.
